ygData.subject: Level 20 Combat Strategies
ygData.msgSnippet: Wizards of Norrath, I have just made level 20 and have noticed that I now get several options besides root and nuke.  Enstill and Titan Clash come to mind, DD
ygData.messageBody:
Wizards of Norrath,

I have just made level 20 and have noticed that I now get several options besides root and nuke. Enstill and Titan Clash come to mind, DD spell does some stunning, plus I still got my old Root and Nukes. The new DD gets resisted A LOT, possibly because of its dual effects, damage & stun. Would appreciate any insights/combo strategies, especially ones that concentrate on Titan Clash, Enstill, Root, etc etc. Seems to me
that Titan Clash could be pretty useful against
enemy casters, since it interrupts them. Oh well, post your experiences.

Thank you for you help.

Anglagard Level 20 Dark Elf in Povar
